service_alerts.subject: Disruption of deploying new Vultr DBaaS subscriptions

entries.message: Our team reports that DBaaS subscriptions should be fully operational. We will continue to monitor the health of service over the next 24 hours.

We are investigating a problem with the creation of new Vultr DBaaS instances (mysql, pgsql, redis, ferretdb).  The operational status of existing DBaaS subscriptions is not affected though adding additional replicas or other features that require a deploy may be affected.

service_alerts.subject: New Jersey HDD Block Storage Upgrades - 2024-03-08

entries.message:
Event Type: HDD Block Storage Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2024-03-08 08:00:00 America/New_York
End Time: 2024-03-08 20:00:00 America/New_York

Our Cloud Storage team will be performing upgrades to our New Jersey HDD Block Storage infrastructure starting at 2024-03-08 08:00:00 America/New_York (13:00:00 UTC). During this maintenance window, creating, attaching, resizing, and deletion of HDD Block Storage volumes may be temporarily unavailable.

Previously deployed HDD Block Storage volumes in New Jersey will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Start Time: 2024-03-05 11:00:00 America/Los_Angeles
End Time: 2024-03-05 23:00:00 America/Los_Angeles

Our Cloud Storage team will be performing upgrades to our Los Angeles deployment infrastructure starting at 2024-03-05 11:00:00 America/Los_Angeles (18:15:00 UTC). During this maintenance window, new deployments, snapshot functionality, and custom ISOs may be temporarily unavailable.

Previously deployed servers in Los Angeles will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Warsaw location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2024-03-08 24:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2024-03-08 04:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Warsaw instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

service_alerts.subject: Potential service disruption in Tel Aviv

entries.message:
The Constant Company, creator of Vultr, is aware of and following the situation in Israel. At this time we do not expect any disruption of service in our Tel Aviv location.  We will continue to closely monitor services as the situation evolves, and we will advise our customers of any changes which have the potential to impact service delivery.

We believe this is a crucial time to remind our customers about the importance of the 3-2-1 Backup Strategy for safeguarding all critical data. Please see the case study here for more information: https://www.vultr.com/docs/case-study-use-a-321-backup-strategy-at-vultr/

Please note that Vultr Snapshots and Backups are stored in the same location as the instance they are made from, however when you deploy a new instance from them in a different location, they will be automatically transferred and stored in the new location as well.
